import React from "react"; import NavBanner from "../Components/NavBanner"; import CarouselBanner from '../Components/Carousel'; import ToolBar from "../Components/ToolBar"; import PlaceholderPost from "../Components/Placeholderpost"; import { useState } from "react"; import '../css/user_account.css'; import { useEffect } from "react"; import { Navbar } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import Desktopnav from "../Components/desktopnav"; import DisplayName from "../Components/displayname"; import DisplayUsername from "../Components/displayusername"; import { BrowserView, MobileView, isBrowser, isMobile } from 'react-device-detect'; function Accountpage(){ const [user, setUser] = useState(null); const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { const userStr = localStorage.getItem('user'); if (userStr) { setUser(JSON.parse(userStr)); } }, []); const logOut = () => { localStorage.removeItem('user'); setUser(null); navigate('/Phptest'); }; return( <> {/*
*/}
